documentation.title: Use Declaration
documentation.standard: Trait import use statements must be defined correctly.

code.title: Valid: Trait import statement is declared on the next line after the opening brace.
Invalid: Trait import statement not declared on the first non-comment line after the class opening brace.
Valid: Each individual trait that is imported into a class is included one-per-line, and each inclusion has its own use import statement.
Invalid: Multiple trait import statements on the same line. Using one use statement to import multiple traits (when no conflict resolution rule is present).
Valid: No blank line after use import statement when the class/enum has nothing after it.
Invalid: Class/enum closing brace not on the next line after the use import statement when class/enum only contains import statements.
Valid: If a class has content after the trait import statement, import statement must have a blank line after it.
Invalid: Missing blank line after the use import statement.
Valid: There is only one space after the import use statement.
Invalid: There is more than one space after the import use statement.
Valid: When using insteadof and as operators, they are properly formatted.
Invalid: Multiple spaces found before or after insteadof and as operators.

Valid: When importing multiple traits and using conflict resolution operators, there must be only one space between traits after the comma, and no space before a comma. The opening brace must be on the same line as the use statement. Each conflict resolution statement must be on its own line.

Invalid: Multiple spaces around commas in trait import statements. Opening brace of a trait import statement not on the same line as the use keyword. Conflict resolution statement is not the its own line.
Valid: Imported traits are grouped together.
Invalid: Imported traits are not grouped together.
